channel.title: Atualizações ICAM - Clínica e Diagnóstico
channel.description: Sinopses de artigos científicos produzidas pela equipa ICAM.

item.title: Garantir um controlo metabólico precoce e completo de todos os doentes afetados pela COVID-19
item.description: Endocrine and metabolic link to coronavirus infection. Bornstein, et al. Nature reviews. Endocrinology. | 02-Apr-2020

item.title: A COVID-19 e o sistema cardiovascular: implicações no tratamento
item.description: COVID-19 and the cardiovascular system. Zheng, et al. Nature reviews. Cardiology. | May-2020

item.title: A COVID-19 não provoca uma síndrome de dificuldade respiratória aguda típica
item.description: Covid-19 Does Not Lead to a "Typical" Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome. Gattinoni, et al. American journal of respiratory and critical care medicine. | 30-Mar-2020

item.title: COVID-19 e doenças cardiovasculares: devemos iniciar ou continuar a terapêutica com IECAs ou ARAs?
item.description: Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) and Cardiovascular Disease. Clerkin, et al. Circulation. | 21-Mar-2020

item.title: Recorrência de análise positiva para o ARN do SARS-CoV-2: relato de caso.
item.description: Recurrence of positive SARS-CoV-2 RNA in COVID-19: A case report. Chen, et al. International journal of infectious diseases : IJID : official publication of the International Society for Infectious Diseases. | 05-Mar-2020

item.title: Epidemiologia e características clínicas da pneumonia por 2019-nCoV
item.description: Epidemiological and clinical characteristics of 99 cases of 2019 novel coronavirus pneumonia in Wuhan, China: a descriptive study. Chen, et al. Lancet (London, England). | 15-Feb-2020

item.title: Origem, transmissão e terapias clínicas da COVID-19: uma revisão.
item.description: The origin, transmission and clinical therapies on coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) outbreak - an update on the status. Guo, et al. Military Medical Research. | 13-Mar-2020

item.title: Prevalência de SARS-CoV-2 em doentes assintomáticos e com imagiologia por TC negativa
item.description: Asymptomatic SARS-CoV-2 infected patients with persistent negative CT findings. Ling, et al. European journal of radiology. | May-2020

item.title: Características epidemiológicas e clínicas da pneumonia por COVID-19 em 138 doentes internados em Wuhan
item.description: Clinical Characteristics of 138 Hospitalized Patients With 2019 Novel Coronavirus-Infected Pneumonia in Wuhan, China. Wang, et al. JAMA. | 07-Feb-2020

item.title: Características clínicas da pneumonia por co-infeção com SARS-CoV-2 e vírus da influenza
item.description: The clinical characteristics of pneumonia patients coinfected with 2019 novel coronavirus and influenza virus in Wuhan, China. Ding, et al. Journal of medical virology. | 20-Mar-2020
